name: ServiceManager
description: The ServiceManager class provides comprehensive management for background services in JsMacros. Services are background scripts designed to run continuously and are primarily noticed by their side effects rather than direct user interaction.
overview:
The ServiceManager class provides the following main functionalities:
- Service registration and unregistration with unique names
- Service lifecycle management (start, stop, restart, enable, disable)
- Service status monitoring and querying
- Automatic reloading when service files are modified
- Configuration persistence and loading
- Crash detection and recovery mechanisms
- Integration with the JsMacros event system

methods.name: registerService
methods.signature: registerService(String name, String file, boolean enabled)
methods.description: Registers a new service with a unique name and file path.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The unique name for the service.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The file path to the service script (relative to macro folder).

parameters.name: enabled
parameters.description: Whether the service should be enabled immediately.

methods.name: unregisterService
methods.description: Unregisters and removes an existing service.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the service to unregister.

methods.name: getServices
methods.description: Retrieves a collection of all registered service names.

methods.name: status
methods.description: Checks the current status of a specific service.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the service to start.

methods.name: isRunning
methods.description: Checks if a specific service is currently running.

methods.name: isEnabled
methods.description: Checks if a specific service is enabled.

methods.name: isCrashed
methods.description: Checks if a specific service has crashed.

methods.name: disableService
methods.description: Disables a service, stopping it and preventing auto-start.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the service to disable.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the service to enable.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the service to restart.

methods.name: startReloadListener
methods.description: Enables auto-reload for all services to monitor file changes.

methods.name: disableReload
methods.description: Disables auto-reload for a specific service.

methods.name: tickReloadListener
methods.description: Manually triggers a check for file modifications to reload services.

methods.name: getTrigger
methods.description: Retrieves the configuration trigger object for a service.

methods.name: getServiceData
methods.description: Retrieves the running data context (EventService) for a specific service, allowing access to global variables.
